  • Constructor Details

    • LoanOffer

      public LoanOffer(String bankName, double interestRate, double monthlyFee, double requiredSavings)
      Calls the parent constructor and adds a requiredSavings field
      Parameters:
      bankName - Name of a Bank
      interestRate - Interest Rate of the offer
      monthlyFee - The monthly fee that has to be paid
      requiredSavings - The amount of savings a customer is required to have to take the loan

  • Method Details

    • score

      public double score(double clientSavings, double loanAmount, int months) throws InvalidLoanParametersException
      Calculates the score for provided Customer's data
      Parameters:
      clientSavings - Client's savings
      loanAmount - Clients declared loan amount
      months - Months to pay the loan
      Returns:
      Total cost of the loan
      Throws:
      InvalidLoanParametersException - InvalidParameters
      See Also:
      • Offer.calculateTotalCost(double, int)

    • score

      public double score(CustomerProfile profile) throws InvalidLoanParametersException
      Score method overridden - calls the score(s,d,m) function for the customer profile
      Parameters:
      profile - Customer's data provided
      Returns:
      loan score calculated for the customer's data
      Throws:
      InvalidLoanParametersException - Invalid parameters provided by the customer
